songs.title: King Kong
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
One two raw, we don’t stop
Psycho Les, Queens, Granville
(Tell the people)
Boot camp, big knobs, it’s dope
(Tell the people)
Listen it go

[Verse 1]
King Kong, Kong King
I swing on niggas I don’t sing
My friends appreciate my dumb effort
Granville, Billy Bob, by the blood records
Swear to God if I club it’s billy club
Red Kool-Aid that’s really [?]
(Tell the people)
I know what I do too
Just finish play it safe and get Bobby to shoot you
(Tell the people)
Shit you a dick in the bun dude
Dressed like New Edition with the hit gun proof
Ronny, Bobby, Ricky, Mike
(Tell the people)
Sean P, Javi, he’s ripping the mic
I’m Muslim, I know Christian brothers
We shop and picking while snooping on Christian brothers
The one you run to for the one two shall slaughter
If you send Lou, Sean Lad, Corduroy, peacemotherfucker
(Tell the people)

[Outro]
Thank you guys
